ability.desc: Slam the target dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Golem Smash

ability.desc: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Occasionally dash around the board.
ability.name: Swimming Speed

ability.desc: The Training Dummy cannot move or attack. It is also dressed like a devilishly handsome Yordle.
ability.name: On Duty!

ability.desc: The Voidspawn gains bonus Health and Attack Damage based on the current Stage.
ability.name: Voidborn

ability.desc: Passive: Heal to full Health whenever an allied Krug dies.
ability.name: Stone Salvage

ability.desc: Passive: Leap to the enemy backline at the beginning of combat.
ability.name: Pack Attack

ability.desc: Passive: Leap to the enemy backline at the beginning of combat.
ability.name: Pack Attack

ability.desc: Passive: Gain Attack Speed whenever an allied Razorbeak dies.
ability.name: Furious Flock

ability.desc: Passive: Gain Attack Speed whenever an allied Razorbeak dies.
ability.name: Furious Flock

ability.desc: Combat start: Charge forward, dealing <magicDamage>@MaxHealthPct*100@%</magicDamage> max Health magic damage and stunning enemies.
ability.name: Void Charge

ability.desc: Passive: Attacks splash in a cone behind the target.
ability.name: Primordial Breath

ability.desc: Throw a paint bomb at the largest group of enemies within <TFTBonus>@ModifiedCastRange@ (%i:scaleRange%)</TFTBonus> hexes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within @PrimaryHexRadius@ hex and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the nearest @NumSecondaryMissiles@ enemies.
ability.name: Paint Bomb

ability.desc:
Heal @TotalHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) Health, then deal @Damage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and @SunderTooltip*100@% Sunder enemies within 1 hex for @Duration@ seconds.

Kingpin bonus: Increase Ability range to @T1HexRange@@T3HexRange@ hexes. Damage reduced by @T1DamageFalloff*100@% per hex away. Heal @TotalBossHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Health for each enemy hit.

{{TFT_Keyword_Sunder}}
ability.name: Kneecapper

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @PercentHPBonus*100@% more max Health from all sources. (Bonus Health:  @TFTUnitProperty.unit:TFT14_DrMundo_TotalBonusHealth@)

Active: Flex, healing @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Health, then deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.
ability.name: Flex On 'Em

ability.desc: Fire @NumTargetLasers@ lasers at the current target and @NumNearestLasers@ more split between the nearest @NumAdditionalEnemies@ enemies, each dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and reducing Magic Resist by <TFTBonus>@MagicResistReduction@</TFTBonus> for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Fire on all Cylinders

ability.desc:
For @Duration@ seconds, tether to the closest @NumEnemies@ enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second split between them. Tethers apply @ShredPercent*100@% Shred and heal Fiddlesticks for @HealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt.

{{TFT_Keyword_Shred}}
ability.name: 3RR0R

ability.desc: Gain <scaleLevel>@ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleLevel> Durability for @Duration@ seconds. Afterwards, heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and send a whirlwind at the enemy within @WhirlwindRange@ hexes that dealt the most damage to Galio during that time. It deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and Stuns for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Stonewall

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target and send a wave that deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedWaveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies hit. If the wave hits @TargetThreshold@ or fewer enemies, gain <TFTBonus>@ManaRefund@</TFTBonus> Mana.
ability.name: Banwave

ability.desc: Send <TFTBonus>@ModifiedSigilCount@</TFTBonus> sigils, alternating between the current target and the next nearest enemy, each dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Every cast, send @SigilIncrement@ more sigil.
ability.name: Data Spike

ability.desc:
Fire @WaveCount@ waves of bullets towards the largest clump of enemies over @ChannelDuration@ seconds. Enemies struck take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage from the first bullet of each wave, and @PercentReducedBulletDamage*100@% less from other bullets in the same wave.

Kingpin bonus: Fire @T1BonusWaves@ more waves. Bullets pierce enemies for @T3BossPierceMod*100@% damage.
ability.name: Street Sweeper

ability.desc: Hack the target and the nearest non-hacked enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Short Circuit

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedTotalShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and create an expanding zone that pops three times, each dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit. The third pop Chills enemies for @ChillDuration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}
ability.name: Pop Up Mural

ability.desc:
Deal @TotalSpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Burn, and Wound them for @Duration@ seconds. Gain @MaxHealthGain@ max Health.

First Cast: Enter frenzy mode where attacks strike twice, dealing @DoubleStrikeTotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) total physical damage and can dash to new targets.

Second Cast: Frenzy mode now strikes thrice, dealing @TripleStrikeTotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) total physical damage. Cannot cast again.

{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}
ability.name: Dominus

ability.desc:
Heal @ModifiedHealAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health and leap to the lowest Health enemy in @ModifiedHexRange@ hexes, dealing @ModifiedDamageAmount@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Then, strike @NumSlashes@ times, each dealing @ModifiedSlashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Each cast increases leap range by 1 hex.
ability.name: Freestyle

ability.desc:
Dash towards the target and fire a volley of @ModifiedNumBullets@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%) bullets over @VolleyDuration@ seconds split between enemies within three hexes. Each bullet reduces armor by @ArmorShredPerBullet@ and deals @ModifiedBulletDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage, reduced by @FalloffPercent*100@% per hex distance from Samira (Total Damage: @TotalVolleyDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)).

When the volley ends, dash back to safety while dealing @ModifiedSlideDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.

For the duration of the Ability, Samira is Unstoppable and has @ModifiedOmnivamp@ (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp.
ability.name: Demon Trigger

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal @TotalPassiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies adjacent to the target.

Active: Fire a beam two hexes beyond the current target, dealing @TotalSpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies hit.
ability.name: Ion Beam

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @ADPercentGain*100@% Attack Damage for each kill this game. (Kills: @TFTUnitProperty.unit:TFT14_ShacoADStacks@, @TFTUnitProperty.unit:TFT14_ShacoTotalStackAD@% %i:scaleAD%)

Active: Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.

Kingpin bonus: Teleport behind the lowest Health enemy within @T1HexRange@ hexes and deal @ModifiedT1Damage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage@ModifiedT3Damage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage. If this kills, immediately cast again with @BossRecastMultiplier*100@% damage.
ability.name: Felony Fantastique

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @APGain@ Ability Power each Attack.

Active: Throw a card at the current target and next nearest target, dealing @Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Kingpin bonus: Throw a random special card at the current target that deals @ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.Throw two special cards at two targets that deal @ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage: one Red and one Blue. Red card hits enemies in a 1-hex area. Blue card deals @TDPercent*100@% of its damage as true damage. Rarely, throw a Yellow card that grants gold.
ability.name: Ace High

ability.desc: Fire a chain that deals <magicDamage>@MainTargetModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and Stuns for @StunDuration@ seconds. The chain links to the @NumAdditionalTargets@ closest enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@SecondaryTargetModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to each.
ability.name: Malware Chain

ability.desc:
Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and @BossDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

If Veigar is the same star level as the target, deal @SameStarPercentTrueDamage*100@% true damage. If Veigar is a higher star level, deal @HigherStarPercentTrueDamage*100@% true damage.
ability.name: Cyber Supremacy

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @OmnivampAmt*100@% Omnivamp. @OverhealConversion*100@% of overhealing from Retribution's damage is converted to bonus true damage to its primary target.

Active: Send a shadow to the target, dealing @ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies it passes through. The shadow then explodes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target and @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) to enemies within @AoEDamageHexRange@ hex.
ability.name: Retribution

ability.desc: Throw a shuriken at the furthest unmarked enemy within @SearchRange@ hexes that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedShurikenDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and marks them. Then become untargetable, teleport to them, and summon shadows on every other marked enemy. Deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSpinDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies, while shadows deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedShadowSpinDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Cutthroat Business

ability.desc:
Dash to a nearby location so quickly an untargetable echo lingers. The echo Attacks (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAS%) as if it were Zeri, but deals @CopyDamagePercent*100@% damage.

Echoes last @ModifiedDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds, and disappear when Zeri dies.
ability.name: Hyperthread Rush

ability.desc: Send a large vine towards the current target, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ second and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Send a smaller vine at the nearest target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Stroke of Brilliance

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When it breaks, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the @TargetNum@ closest enemies and Chill them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Kingpin bonus: Gain @BossResistsT1@@BossResistsT3@ Armor and Magic Resist. Every @BossThornsPeriod@@BossThornsPeriodT3@ seconds, Braum's next attack deals @ModifiedBossDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%%i:scaleHealth%) bonus magic damage.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}
ability.name: Protection Racket

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedAmpedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the <TFTBonus>@ModifiedNumTargets@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%)</TFTBonus> nearest enemies. Heal <scaleHealth>@HealAmount@</scaleHealth> Health + <scaleHealth>@HealAmountPerTarget@</scaleHealth> per enemy hit.
ability.name: Charged Claws

ability.desc:
First cast: Every second for the rest of combat, heal @ModifiedHealPerTick@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) Health and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Gain @ModifiedHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) max Health and @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp.
ability.name: Burnout

ability.desc: Fire wolf at the current target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Overkill damage bounces to the nearest enemy.
ability.name: Rev Up

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @TotalManaReduction@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%) Mana every second.

Active: Launch a magic missile at the current target that bounces to the nearest enemy. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) to the other, marking both of them. If they're already marked, deal @MarkMultiplier*100@% damage.
ability.name: Yuum.AI

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health. Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage the current target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSplashDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> to enemies within @SplashRadius@-hex. Reduce their Magic Resist by <TFTBonus>@MRReduction@</TFTBonus> for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Bionic Battle Bear

ability.desc: Fire a soundwave through the current target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, reduced by @DamageMod*100@% for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Ping()

ability.desc: Impale @FeatherCount@ feathers into the current target that each deal @ModifiedCastDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. When the target dies, the feathers seek out nearby enemies within 2-hexes, each dealing @ModifiedExplodeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
ability.name: Buffer Overflow

ability.desc:
Fire a bouncing grenade that hits four enemies, dealing @BounceDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and @SunderPercent*100@% Sundering them for @ModifiedSunderDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds. The fourth bounce returns to the initial target and deals @FinalBounceDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

{{TFT_Keyword_Sunder}}
ability.name: Logic Bomb

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @ModifiedOmnivamp@ (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target. Then, summon @ModifiedNumPackmates@ packmates that deal @PackmateDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and @ModifiedNumGigaDogs@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%) Alphas that deal @ModifiedGigaDogDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.
ability.name: Alpha Protocol

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health, then throw a cask at the largest group of enemies within @SearchRange@ hexes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within @HexRadius@ hex.
ability.name: Corporate Mixer

ability.desc: For the next @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@AttackSpeedPercent*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed and attacks deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> bonus physical damage.
ability.name: Fire at Will

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@TotalShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds and dredge up a missile. When the Shield ends, hurl the missile at the group of most enemies within <TFTBonus>@ModifiedCastRange@ (%i:scaleRange%)</TFTBonus> hexes, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the centermost enemy, and @ReducedDamage*100@% of the damage to enemies adjacent to them.
ability.name: Missile Defense

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Ion Barrier

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedOnHitDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage, and @CyberbossOnHitPercentDamage*100@% in a one hex radius. At @PassiveHealthThreshold*100@% Health, trigger 'Phase 2', then enrage for the rest of the fight, gaining @EnrageAS*100@% Attack Speed, @EnrageOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, and increasing the bonus magic damage by @EnrageOnHitBonus*100@%.

Phase 2: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Pick up a nearby enemy, knocking up all enemies within 2 hexes for @StunDuration@ seconds. Then, slam down, dealing @ModifiedPrimaryTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target and @ModifiedSecondaryTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all other enemies hit.
ability.name: Game Over!

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @BonusResists*100@% more Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

Active: Throw an EMP at the current target that explodes after @Delay@ seconds. It deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within @HexRange@ hexes and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Blue Screen

ability.desc: Throw a buckler at the farthest enemy within @HexRange@ hexes, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage<ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss> to them <TFT14_Cyberboss>and <magicDamage>@BossDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 1 hex</TFT14_Cyberboss></ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss>. Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield.
ability.name: Buckler Toss

ability.desc: Throw a bomb that hits the most enemies in a <ShowIfNot.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss>+ shape</ShowIfNot.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss><ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss><TFT14_Cyberboss>whole row and column</TFT14_Cyberboss></ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss> within Attack Range, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage<ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss> to enemies within @HexRange@ hex of the center <TFT14_Cyberboss>and <magicDamage>@ModifiedBossDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies further away</TFT14_Cyberboss></ShowIf.TFT14_Cyberboss_IsBoss>. If only one unit is hit, deal @SingleTargetDamagePercentIncrease*100@% more.
ability.name: Bomberyordle

ability.desc: Fire a disorienting sound blast in a cone, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Gain <scaleHealth>@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_ChogathTotalHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</scaleHealth> max Health, get bigger, and increase the size of future sound blasts.
ability.name: Sonic Scream

ability.desc:
For @Duration@ seconds, gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and lock-on to the lowest percent Health enemy within @ModifiedCastRange@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Attacks also fire @NumMissiles@ rockets, each dealing @TotalRocketDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) total physical damage.

Each cast, the first time a locked-on enemy falls beneath @ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health, execute them, reel them in, and grind them into parts.
ability.name: Fear Beyond Death

ability.desc: Gain <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> max Health and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target. If they die, gain an additional <scaleHealth>@OnKillHealth@</scaleHealth> Health.
ability.name: Chains of the Pack

ability.desc:
On first cast, swap places with the left-most champion on your bench and continue fighting. That champion gains @ModifiedBonusAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed. If the swapped champion dies, return to the board.

Teleport to hit the most enemies in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) to each one, plus @ModifiedSplitDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) split between all enemies hit.

Aurora cannot swap places with another Aurora.
ability.name: Pierce the Veil

ability.desc: Rapidly fire @NumAttacks@ attacks. The first two deal <trueDamage>@ModifiedTrueDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage, and the final attack deals <trueDamage>@ModifiedFinalHitDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage.
ability.name: Bat Bolts

ability.desc:
Gain @ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for @DRDuration@ seconds. Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the largest clump of enemies within 2 hexes and Stun the center enemy for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Enemies damaged by this ability take @MagicResistDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%) bonus magic damage from allies' attacks for @MarkDamageDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Solar Flare

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@TotalShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield that rapidly decays over @Duration@ seconds. Vi's next attack deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Block Chain

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Slam the current target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a 2-hex line and Stun all enemies hit for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Antivirus

ability.desc:
Passive: Reduce all incoming damage by @ModifiedDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Gilded Endurance

ability.desc:
Passive: When units die, absorb their soul and heal @ModifiedSoulHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Health.

Active: Jump to the largest clump of enemies within @JumpRange@ hexes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and @ModifiedSplashDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to other enemies within @DamageRadius@ hexes. @TooltipShred@% Shred all enemies hit for @ShredDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
ability.name: Holoblade

ability.desc: Strike the most enemies in a semi-circle, gaining <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds plus <TFTBonus>@ModifiedBonusShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> per enemy hit. Deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSweepDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies hit and reduce their Armor by <scaleLevel>@FlatArmorReduction@</scaleLevel> for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Half-Moon Sweep

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks fire @NumProjectiles@ projectiles in a cone that deal @ModifiedProjectileDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage each. Graves casts every @AttacksPerCast@ attacks.

Active: Dash next to the target and quickly fire @BaseEmpoweredShells@ empowered shells that deal @ModifiedEmpoweredProjectileDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage per projectile.
ability.name: Buckshot of Midas

ability.desc:
Throw a fireball at the current target that deals @ModifiedMainDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @TotalNumFireballs@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%) mini-fireballs split between the target and @FireballsNumTargets@ nearby enemies that deal @ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.

Every @CastCount@ casts, instead, summon Tibbers (%i:scaleAP%%i:set14AmpIcon%) next to the current target, dealing @ModifiedTibbersDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within @Radius@ hex.
ability.name: Goldilocks

ability.desc: Knock the target into the air for @StunDuration@ seconds. Over the duration, heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</scaleHealth> Health and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target.
ability.name: Reaping Slash

ability.desc:
Passive: Has @ModifiedTibbersAS@ (%i:set14AmpIcon%) Attack Speed. Burns and Wounds adjacent enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}
ability.name: Meltdown

ability.desc:
Fire grenades at the nearest @NumMissiles@ enemies, dealing @ModifiedMissileDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT14_HotRod_LaserTooltip_Blank@
ability.name: Rage With the Machines

ability.desc: Hurl two massive axes at the most enemies in a line, dealing <physicalDamage>@BigOutModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage before returning. Damage is reduced by @ReducedDamagePercent*100@% for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Cache Hack

ability.desc:
Passive: At @SplitPercentHealth*100@% Health, split into two copies with @PassiveHealthTriggerPercent*100@% Health.

Active: Bounce @BounceCount@ times on nearby enemies. Each bounce deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage, Stuns for @stunduration@ second, and heals Zac @ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health.
ability.name: Replicating Malware

ability.desc: Fire <TFTBonus>@ModifiedRockets@</TFTBonus> rockets at random enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Each cast fires an additional rocket.
ability.name: Rampant Vandalism

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealActive@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
ability.name: Paintover

ability.desc: Always watching you.
ability.name: Surveillance

ability.desc: Cleans up the scum of the streets.
ability.name: Cannon Blast

ability.desc: Specialized soldiers for solving specialized problems.
ability.name: Shock Troops

ability.desc: Breaks up particularly stubborn factions.
ability.name: Dispersal Protocol

ability.desc:
Call down @NumMeteors@ meteors on random enemies that deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, Burn, and Wound for @Duration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}
ability.name: Tears in the Rain

ability.desc: Call forth a wall of charging Mechasoldiers that deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@</magicDamage> magic damage and Stun enemies hit for <TFTBonus>@KnockupDuration@</TFTBonus> second.
ability.name: Divide and Cull

ability.desc: This egg will soon hatch into loot! LOSSES accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.
ability.name: Hacked Egg

ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Tome of Traits

ability.desc: Permanently increase Zac's maximum Health and Ability Power.
ability.name: Permanently increase Zac's maximum Health and Ability Power.

ability.desc: Sell this orb to gain 1XP.
ability.name: Anima Squad XP Orb

ability.desc: Permanently increase Zac's maximum Health and Ability Power.
ability.name: Permanently increase Zac's maximum Health and Ability Power.

ability.desc:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals @TotalBlastDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies within @BlastSize@ hexes.

Equip @BaseChakramNumber@ Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast, that last for @ChakramAttacks@ attacks and deal @TotalChakramDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage each.
ability.name: Moonlight Vigil

ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Tome of Traits

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of completed items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Completed Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of component items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Component Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Artifact items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Artifact Item Anvil

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Support items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Support item anvil

ability.desc: This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!
ability.name: Mercenary Chest

traits.desc:
Divinicorp champions grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Divinicorp in play.

Divinicorp champions gain double.

(@MinUnits@) @DivinicorpBonus*100@% bonus.

Morgana -  %i:scaleAP% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_AP@%
Rhaast -  %i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_Defenses@
Senna -  %i:scaleAD% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_AD@%
Gragas -  %i:scaleHealth% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_Health@
Vex -  %i:scaleCrit% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_Crit@%
Renekton -  %i:scaleAS% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_AS@%
Emblem -  %i:scaleSV% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Trait_Divinicorp_Omnivamp@%
traits.name: Divinicorp

traits.desc:
Allies in painted hexes gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage. Some hexes are Signature hexes and grant @EmpoweredHexPercentBonus*100@% more.

Street Demons double all bonuses.

(@MinUnits@) +@HP*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @ADAP@ %i:scaleAP%, @ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HP*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @ADAP@ %i:scaleAP%, @ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HP*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @ADAP@ %i:scaleAP%, @ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HP*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @ADAP@ %i:scaleAP%, @ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%
Paint the town!
traits.name: Street Demon

traits.desc:
A.M.P. champions upgrade their abilities in unique ways with Amp (%i:set14AmpIcon%). They also gain Health.

(@MinUnits@) @SuperchargeAmount@ %i:set14AmpIcon%, @HPAmt@ %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: A.M.P.

traits.desc:
At each tier, pick a weapon that a random Anima Squad champion fires periodically during combat. Anima Squad champions gain Armor, Magic Resist, and Damage Amp.

(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_AnimaSquad_Bonus_1@
(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_AnimaSquad_Bonus_2@
(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_AnimaSquad_Bonus_3@
(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_AnimaSquad_Bonus_4@

Weapons scale with Anima Squad star level and stage.
traits.name: Anima Squad

traits.desc:
Vanguards gain @DamageReductionPct*100@% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and @HealthThreshold*100@% Health: Gain a max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health;
@EnhancedDurability*100@% %i:scaleDR% while Shielded
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc:
Slayers gain Attack Damage and Omnivamp. Overhealing heals the lowest percent Health Slayer for @OverhealPercent*100@% of the excess amount.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackDamage*100@% %i:scaleAD%, @Healing*100@% %i:scaleSV%
traits.name: Slayer

traits.desc: Gain a hologram copy of the highest cost enemy Viego helped kill last round. It has @Level1Health@/@Level2Health@/@Level3Health@ Health, deals @Level1Damage*100@%/@Level2Damage*100@%/@Level3Damage*100@% damage, and has @ItemCount@ recommended item.
traits.name: Soul Killer

traits.desc:
Your strongest Cyberboss upgrades to its final form and gains Health, Ability Power, and its ability hits more enemies.

(@MinUnits@) @BossPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BossAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @BossPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @BossAP@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) All Cyberbosses upgrade. Your strongest Cyberboss gains @BigBossPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth% and @BigBossAP@ %i:scaleAP%.
traits.name: Cyberboss

traits.desc:
Executioner Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

If the target's Health is below @HealthThreshold*100@%, the bonus Critical Strike Damage is doubled.

(@MinUnits@) @CRIT_PERCENT*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CRIT_DAMAGE*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CRIT_PERCENT*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CRIT_DAMAGE*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CRIT_PERCENT*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CRIT_DAMAGE*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%
(@MinUnits@) @CRIT_PERCENT*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CRIT_DAMAGE*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%; also gain @DamageReduction*100@% Durability
traits.name: Executioner

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideArmor@ Armor and Magic Resist. Bastions gain more.

For the first @Duration@ seconds of combat, Bastions increase their bonus by @StatMultiplier*100@%.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% Non-Bastions gain an additional @EnhancedTeamwideArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%.
traits.name: Bastion

traits.desc:
Gain unique items that can only be equipped by Exotech champions. They gain Health and Attack Speed for each item equipped.

(@MinUnits@) @HealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth%, @ASBonus@% %i:scaleAS%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Cybernetic_Item1@
(@MinUnits@) @HealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth%, @ASBonus@% %i:scaleAS%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Cybernetic_Item2@
(@MinUnits@) @HealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth%, @ASBonus@% %i:scaleAS%,
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Cybernetic_Item3@
(@MinUnits@) @HealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth%, @ASBonus@% %i:scaleAS%,
Enhance.
traits.name: Exotech

traits.desc: The Overlord takes a bite out of the unit in the hex behind him, dealing @HPPercentDamage*100@% of their max Health as true damage. He gains @PercentHPGain*100@% of their Health and @PercentADGain*100@% of their Attack Damage.
traits.name: Overlord

traits.desc:
After @Rounds@ player combats, open an Armory of Trait Mods that permanently reprogram a champion to benefit from a trait (but not contribute).

Every time you get a Trait Mod, the next one requires @RoundIncrement@ additional round.

Rounds remaining: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_RoundsRemaining@
Champions can only have one Trait Mod.

Equipped Mods:
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait1@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ1@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait2@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ2@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait3@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ3@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait4@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ4@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait5@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ5@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait6@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ6@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait7@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ7@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait8@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ8@
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Trait9@ - @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Netgod_Champ9@
traits.name: God of the Net

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamBonus*100@% Attack Speed. Rapidfire champions gain more on each attack, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeed*100@% %i:scaleAS% per stack
traits.name: Rapidfire

traits.desc:
Combat Start: Allies in the back 2 rows gain Damage Amp. Allies in the front 2 rows gain Durability. Strategists get triple.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @Durability*100@% %i:scaleDR%
traits.name: Strategist

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideHealth@ Health. Bruisers gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @HealthBonus*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Bruiser

traits.desc:
Marksmen gain Attack Damage. After @EnhancedTime@ seconds of combat, they increase their bonus by @EnhancedBonus*100@%.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAD*100@% %i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAD*100@% %i:scaleAD%. After @EnhancedTime@ seconds, gain @RepeatBonus*100@% %i:scaleAD% every @RepeatTime@ seconds.
traits.name: Marksman

traits.desc:
Golden Ox gain Damage Amp and have a chance to drop gold on kill.

If you spend @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Immortal_GoldNeededForBreakpoint@ gold on rerolls or XP in a single turn, permanently increase their Damage Amp and the gold required for the next bonus. Rerolls count double towards gold spent.
(Golden Ox must have fought last round)

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @KillDrop*100@% gold
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @KillDrop*100@% gold
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @KillDrop*100@% loot, @ComponentDropChance*100@% chance loot is a component
Current Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Immortal_GoldBonusStacks@% %i:scaleDA%
traits.name: Golden Ox

traits.desc:
BoomBots fire a missile every @DamageDealtThreshold@ damage dealt at a nearby enemy that deals magic damage. @DamageTakenMod*100@% of damage taken contributes to damage dealt.

(@MinUnits@) @MissileDamage@ magic damage
(@MinUnits@) @MissileDamage@ magic damage
(@MinUnits@) Fire two missiles, each dealing @MissileDamage@ magic damage
traits.name: BoomBot

traits.desc:
Techies gain Ability Power.

Enemies hit by their abilities deal @DamageAmpDebuff*100@% less damage for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @APBonus@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APBonus@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APBonus@ %i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @APBonus@ %i:scaleAP% Enemies hit deal @EnhancedDebuff*100@% less damage.
traits.name: Techie

traits.desc:
Every @Timer@ seconds, your team gains Mana. Dynamos gain @ThirstyBonus*100@% more.

(@MinUnits@) @Mana@ %i:scaleMana%
(@MinUnits@) @Mana@ %i:scaleMana%
(@MinUnits@) @Mana@ %i:scaleMana%
traits.name: Dynamo

traits.desc:
The Virus infects your shop with a @ChanceToSee@% chance to spawn a bloblet. When purchased, it merges and increases the strongest Zac's max Health by @BonusPercentHPPerStack*100@% and Ability Power by @BonusAPPerStack@ (doubled in Hyper Roll).

(Total Bloblets: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Virus_Stacks@)
traits.name: Virus

traits.desc:
Get a Kingpin hat that uniquely upgrades a Syndicate champion's ability.

Syndicate champions gain Health and Damage Amp.

(@MinUnits@) @MobHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @NumBosses@ Kingpin
(@MinUnits@) @MobHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @NumBosses@ Kingpins
(@MinUnits@) @MobHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Upgrade Kingpin effect
traits.name: Syndicate

traits.desc:
Every round, unique Nitro champions grant Chrome to R-080T, based on their star level. Each Chrome grants @HealthPerScrap@ Health and @APPerScrap@ Ability Power.

At @FourStarScrapThreshold@ Chrome, it upgrades to T-43X!

(@MinUnits@) Summon R-080T!
(@MinUnits@) Fire a giant laser!

Chrome per star: @ScrapPerOneStar@/@ScrapPerTwoStar@/@ScrapPerThreeStar@/@ScrapPerFourStar@
traits.name: Nitro

traits.desc:
Gain Intel by losing combat, increased for loss streaks. Gain a small amount for killing enemies.

You may trade your Intel for loot one time on round
@CashoutStage1@-@CashoutRound1@, @CashoutStage2@-@CashoutRound2@, @CashoutStage3@-@CashoutRound3@, @CashoutStage4@-@CashoutRound4@, or @CashoutStage5@-@CashoutRound5@.
After trading Intel, Cypher champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @ValueMultiplier@x Intel, @AttackDamage*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Cypher
